rt.integrators

Class PointLightIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • rt.integrators.PointLightIntegrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Integrator

    public class PointLightIntegrator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Integrator
    Integrator for Whitted style ray tracing. This is a basic version that needs to be extended!

    • Method Detail

      • integrate

        public Spectrum integrate(Ray r)
        Basic integrator that simply iterates over the light sources and accumulates their contributions. No shadow testing, reflection, refraction, or area light sources, etc. supported.
        Specified by:
        integrate in interface Integrator
        Parameters:
        r - the ray
        Returns:
        the contribution of the ray to the image

      • makePixelSamples

        public float[][] makePixelSamples(Sampler sampler,
                                  int n)
        Description copied from interface: Integrator
        Generate samples required by the integrator to evaluate light paths.
        Specified by:
        makePixelSamples in interface Integrator
        Parameters:
        sampler - the type of sampler to be used to generate the samples
        n - the desired number of samples
        Returns:
        the array of samples
